Description:
Modifications to a config that will serve an adversary's impacts or persistence

Author: Austin Clark
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco Modify Configuration
Query: sourcetype="cisco-aaa" ("ip http server" OR "ip https server" OR "kron policy-list" OR "kron occurrence" OR "policy-list" OR "access-list" OR "ip access-group" OR "archive maximum")
